ygData.msgSnippet: ... Try with enchantment spell Charm but be careful if you have too high carisma spell never broke and after theat you will need a spell enchant metal and
ygData.messageBody:
At 13.45 30/04/99 -0400, you wrote:
>From: homecmk@...
>
>Anyone know a good spell to attract women?


Try with enchantment spell "Charm" but be careful if you have too high
carisma spell never broke and after theat you will need a spell "enchant"
metal and some preciouz stones used with one trade skill to create weding
rings. it is very dangerus if you cast it on a ogre leady and after that
say that you wish to visit your uncle in kelethin for some 6 months. As she
start to behaive strangly killing orcs and other things murmuring something
about " i will get this faction up you b...... and THEN !!!!"





Silverion
High elf wizard (against all statistics eheheeh)
